Detailed Description

stores the settings to be used to initialize a dramSystem object

construct a set of settings based upon parameters passed from the command line

Member Function Documentation

bool Settings::loadSettingsFromFile ( int  argc,
char **  argv 
)

load settings from an xml file

loads and populates a Settings object based on a particular settings file and updates the settings based upon the modifiers sent to it

Returns:
true if no errors were encountered, false otherwise
